data.lyric:
[ti:March 14 (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake]
[al:Scorpion (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]March 14 (Explicit) - Drake
[00:01.92]Producer：T-Minus/Josh Valle
[00:03.85]Here we go
[00:07.16]Yeah
[00:10.89]Yesterday morning was crazy
[00:12.04]I had to come to terms with the fact that it's not a maybe
[00:14.63]That sh*t is in stone sealed and signed
[00:17.27]She not my lover like Billie Jean but the kid is mine
[00:20.09]Sandy used to tell me all it takes is one time
[00:22.10]And all it took was one time
[00:23.97]Sh*t we only met two times two times
[00:26.70]And both times were nothing like the new times
[00:29.10]Now it's rough times
[00:30.61]I'm out here on front lines
[00:32.05]Just trying to make sure that I see him sometimes
[00:34.91]It's breaking my spirit
[00:36.81]Single father I hate when I hear it
[00:39.36]I used to challenge my parents on every album
[00:41.29]Now I'm embarrassed to tell them
[00:42.66]I ended up as a co-parent
[00:44.67]Always promised the family unit
[00:47.14]I wanted it to be different
[00:48.16]Because I've been through it
[00:50.43]But this is the harsh truth now
[00:52.01]Fairy tales are saved for the bedtime stories I tell you now
[00:55.22]I don't want you worry about whose house you live at
[00:57.64]Or who loves you more or who's not there
[00:59.82]Who did what to who 'fore you got here
[01:01.75]Now look I'm too proud to let that come between me and you now
[01:04.93]Realize I got a thing for two now
[01:06.73]I gotta make it I better make it
[01:09.08]I promise if I'm not dead then I'm dedicated
[01:11.88]This the first positive DNA we ever celebrated
[01:14.93]I can't forget the looks on they faces
[01:16.78]Got the news in Miami that we all now got ones that we raisin'
[01:20.79]Tell Jello bring some uh Rosé and Baccarat out
[01:23.55]For our cheers to the next generation
[01:26.69]But this champagne toast is short-lived
[01:28.55]I got an empty crib in my empty crib
[01:31.30]I only met you one time introduced you to Saint Nick
[01:33.84]I think he must've brought you like twenty gifts
[01:36.49]Your mother say you growing so fast
[01:38.01]That they don't even really fit
[01:39.38]But man you know I still had to get it
[01:41.48]For my boy though you know
[01:42.90]You haven't met your grandfather yet that n**ga a trip
[01:46.51]He probably coulda did stand-up
[01:48.97]But at the same time he's a stand up
[01:51.77]And that's how you gonna be
[01:52.73]When it's time to man up
[01:54.03]October baby for irony sake of course
[01:56.77]I got this 11 tatted for somebody now it's yours
[01:59.41]And believe me I can't wait to get a hunnid more
[02:02.19]Sorry I'm vintage tryna cover ground
[02:04.61]They said that in two weeks you're supposed to come in town
[02:07.29]Hopefully by the time you hear this me
[02:09.31]And your mother will have come around
[02:10.71]Instead of always cutting each other down
[02:13.99]God willing I got a good feeling
[02:18.74]You got a good spirit
[02:21.21]We'll talk more when you hear this
[02:24.36]My G
[03:04.21]No one to cry in
[03:08.54]I'm all alone
[03:11.41]No one to cry on
[03:18.92]I need shelter from the rain
[03:24.04]To ease the pain
[03:26.32]I'm changing from boy to a man
[03:34.24]No one to cry in
[03:38.79]I'm all alone
[03:41.82]No one to cry on
[03:49.10]I need shelter from the rain
[03:54.30]To ease the pain
[03:56.93]I'm changing from boy to a man
[04:08.98]I'm all alone
[04:12.10]No one to cry on
[04:19.67]I need shelter from the rain
[04:24.60]To ease the pain
[04:27.18]I'm changing from boy to a man
data.trans:
[ti:March 14 (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake]
[al:Scorpion (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:01.92]//
[00:03.85]来吧
[00:07.16]//
[00:10.89]昨天早上真是疯狂
[00:12.04]我没办法 只能接受现实 那事情没什么争议
[00:14.63]那破事儿已经无法改变 已经密封签字画押了
[00:17.27]她不是我的爱人 不是我的Billie Jean 但那孩子确实是我的
[00:20.09]桑迪经常跟我说 一次也可能酿成大祸
[00:22.10]一次也可能酿成大祸
[00:23.97]真是的 我们只见过两次 两次
[00:26.70]两次都没有一点《新时代》的感觉
[00:29.10]现在搞得实在难堪
[00:30.61]我总是在奔波忙碌
[00:32.05]我也在尽力常去看看他
[00:34.91]我都快要崩溃了
[00:36.81]单亲爸爸 我讨厌听到这个词
[00:39.36]我以前经常在歌词里为难我的父母
[00:41.29]现在我得尴尬地告诉他们
[00:42.66]我最后也变成了单亲老爹
[00:44.67]我总在给家里承诺
[00:47.14]我想要改变
[00:48.16]因为我经历过这些
[00:50.43]但如今事实就是这么残酷
[00:52.01]童话故事睡觉的时候才能听 我现在告诉你
[00:55.22]我不想要你担心住的房子是谁的
[00:57.64]或者谁更爱你 抑或谁缺席了
[00:59.82]在你来之前 谁对谁做了什么
[01:01.75]看吧 我现在太骄傲 不愿让那些事情插进我们中间
[01:04.93]我意识到我现在要考虑两个人的事情了
[01:06.73]我必须成功 我最好成功
[01:09.08]我保证 只要我不死 我就全情投入
[01:11.88]这是第一个值得我们庆祝的阳性DNA
[01:14.93]我忘不掉他们脸上的表情
[01:16.78]我在迈阿密的时候听说我们都有了要养育的人
[01:20.79]叫Jello带点粉红葡萄酒和巴卡拉水晶杯过来
[01:23.55]让我们为下一代干杯
[01:26.69]但这场香槟庆祝会很短暂
[01:28.55]我空荡荡的家里只有一张空荡荡的婴儿床
[01:31.30]我只见过你一次 让你见识了一下圣诞老人
[01:33.84]我觉得他肯定给你带来了二十件礼物
[01:36.49]你妈妈说你长得很快
[01:38.01]那些衣服都穿不下了
[01:39.38]但是兄弟 你懂的 我还是要买新衣服
[01:41.48]给我儿子 你懂的
[01:42.90]你还没见过你的爷爷呢 他特别厉害
[01:46.51]他不仅是个单口戏剧演员
[01:48.97]同时还是个顶天立地的男子汉
[01:51.77]你以后就要成为这样的人
[01:52.73]终有一天你要成为男子汉
[01:54.03]十月出生的孩子 当然有点讽刺
[01:56.77]我为了某个人在身上纹了个十一 现在他是你的了
[01:59.41]相信我 我等不及想要再来一百个
[02:02.19]抱歉 我在发泄 想要快速处理这些事情
[02:04.61]他们说 两周之内 你就应该进城了
[02:07.29]说不定到时候你就听说 我
[02:09.31]和你的妈妈相处愉快得很
[02:10.71]再也没有相互攻击了
[02:13.99]上帝旨意 我有一种很不错的感觉
[02:18.74]你的心肠很好
[02:21.21]当你听到这首歌 我们会畅谈一下
[02:24.36]我的天哪
[03:04.21]没人指引我
[03:08.54]我孤军奋战
[03:11.41]无人哭诉
[03:18.92]我需要可以避雨的屋顶
[03:24.04]减轻痛苦
[03:26.32]我正在从男孩变成男人
[03:34.24]没人指引我
[03:38.79]我孤军奋战
[03:41.82]无人哭诉
[03:49.10]我需要可以避雨的屋顶
[03:54.30]减轻痛苦
[03:56.93]我正在从男孩变成男人
[04:08.98]我孤军奋战
[04:12.10]无人哭诉
[04:19.67]我需要可以避雨的屋顶
[04:24.60]减轻痛苦
[04:27.18]我正在从男孩变成男人
